reactor.core.dispatch

Class MultiThreadDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.dispatch.AbstractLifecycleDispatcher
      • reactor.core.dispatch.MultiThreadDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, Dispatcher, Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyEventLoopDispatcher, ThreadPoolExecutorDispatcher, WorkQueueDispatcher

    public abstract class MultiThreadDispatcher
extends AbstractLifecycleDispatcher
    Base implementation for multi-threaded dispatchers
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini, Jon Brisbin

    • Method Detail

      • supportsOrdering

        public boolean supportsOrdering()
        Description copied from interface: Dispatcher
        Inspect if the dispatcher supports ordered dispatching: Single threaded dispatchers naturally preserve event ordering on dispatch. Multi threaded dispatchers can't prevent a single consumer to receives concurrent notifications.
        Returns:
        true if ordering of dispatch is preserved. * @since 2.0

      • backlogSize

        public int backlogSize()
        Description copied from interface: Dispatcher
        Request the capacity for the underlying shared state structure. E.g. RingBufferDispatcher will return RingBuffer.getBufferSize().

        Returns:
        the remaining capacity if supported otherwise it returns a negative value.

        public boolean inContext()
        Description copied from class: AbstractLifecycleDispatcher
